    • Method Detail

      • Advance_GetRef

        public final Ref Advance_GetRef()
        advanced function to get reference of Page object.
        this method require premium license.
        Returns:
        reference

      • Advance_Reload

        public final void Advance_Reload()
        advanced function to reload page object, after advanced methods update Page object data.
        all annotations return from Page.GetAnnot() or Page.GetAnnotFromPoint() shall not available. after this method invoked.
        this method require premium license.

      • GetCropBox

        public final float[] GetCropBox()
        get rotated CropBox, this method need an any type of license.
        Returns:
        float array as [left, top, right, bottom] in PDF coordinate.

      • GetMediaBox

        public final float[] GetMediaBox()
        get rotated MediaBox, this method need an any type of license.
        Returns:
        float array as [left, top, right, bottom] in PDF coordinate.

      • AddAnnot

        public final boolean AddAnnot(long ref)

      • Sign

        public int Sign(Document.DocForm form,
                float[] rect,
                java.lang.String cert_file,
                java.lang.String pswd,
                java.lang.String reason,
                java.lang.String location,
                java.lang.String contact)
        Sign and save the PDF file.
        this method required premium license, and signed feature native libs, which has bigger size.
        Parameters:
        form - appearance for sign field.
        rect - rectangle for sign field
        cert_file - a cert file like .p12 or .pfx file, DER encoded cert file.
        pswd - password to open cert file.
        reason - sign reason will write to signature.
        location - signature location will write to signature.
        contact - contact info will write to signature.
        Returns:
        0 mean OK, others are failed.

      • Close

        public final void Close()
        Close page object and free memory.

      • RenderPrepare

        public final void RenderPrepare(DIB dib)
        prepare to render. it reset dib pixels to white value, and reset page status.
        if dib is null, only to reset page status.
        Parameters:
        dib - DIB object to render. get from Global.dibGet() or null.

      • RenderPrepare

        public final void RenderPrepare(android.graphics.Bitmap bmp)
        same as RenderPrepare(null);

      • Render

        public final boolean Render(DIB dib,
                            Matrix mat)
        render page to dib object. this function returned for cancelled or finished.
        before render, you need invoke RenderPrepare.
        Parameters:
        dib - DIB object to render. obtained by Global.dibGet().
        mat - Matrix object define scale, rotate, translate operations.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • RenderToBmp

        public final boolean RenderToBmp(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                 Matrix mat)
        render page to Bitmap object directly. this function returned for cancelled or finished.
        before render, you need erase Bitmap object.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - Bitmap object to render.
        mat - Matrix object define scale, rotate, translate operations.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • RenderToBuf

        public final boolean RenderToBuf(int[] data,
                                 int w,
                                 int h,
                                 Matrix mat)
        render page to int array directly. this function returned for cancelled or finished.
        before render, you need erase int array object.
        Parameters:
        data - int array store as pixels, must length as w * h, each element formated as 0xAARRGGBB
        w - width.
        h - height.
        mat - Matrix object define scale, rotate, translate operations.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • Render_Normal

        public final boolean Render_Normal(DIB dib,
                                   Matrix mat)
        render to page in normal quality
        Parameters:
        dib - same as Render function
        mat - same as Render function

      • RenderCancel

        public final void RenderCancel()
        set page status to cancelled and cancel render function.

      • RenderThumb

        public final boolean RenderThumb(android.graphics.Bitmap bmp)
        render thumb image to Bitmap object.
        the image always scale and displayed in center of Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        bmp - Bitmap to render
        Returns:
        true if the page has thumb image, or false.

        h -
        Returns:

      • ObjsAlignWord

        public final int ObjsAlignWord(int from,
                               int dir)
        get index aligned by word. this can be invoked after ObjsStart
        Parameters:
        from - 0 based unicode index.
        dir - if dir < 0, get start index of the word. otherwise get last index of the word.
        Returns:
        new index value.

                                  float[] vals)

        vals - return 4 elements for PDF rectangle.

      • FindOpen

        public Page.Finder FindOpen(java.lang.String str,
                            boolean match_case,
                            boolean whole_word)
        create a find session. this can be invoked after ObjsStart
        Parameters:
        str - key string to find.
        match_case - match case?
        whole_word - match whole word?
        Returns:
        handle of find session, or 0 if no found.

      • FindOpen

        public Page.Finder FindOpen(java.lang.String str,
                            boolean match_case,
                            boolean whole_word,
                            boolean skip_blank)
        create a find session. this can be invoked after ObjsStart
        this function treats line break as blank char.
        Parameters:
        str - key string to find.
        match_case - match case?
        whole_word - match whole word?
        skip_blank - skip blank?
        Returns:
        handle of find session, or 0 if no found.

      • GetAnnot

        public Page.Annotation GetAnnot(int index)
        get annotations by index.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        index - 0 based index value. range:[0, GetAnnotCount()-1]
        Returns:
        handle of annotation, valid until Close invoked.

      • GetAnnotFromPoint

        public Page.Annotation GetAnnotFromPoint(float x,
                                         float y)
        get annotation by PDF point.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        x - x value in PDF coordinate system.
        y - y value in PDF coordinate system.
        Returns:
        Annotation object, valid until Page.Close invoked.

      • GetAnnotByName

        public Page.Annotation GetAnnotByName(java.lang.String name)
        get annotation by name.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        name - name string in "NM" entry of annotation.
        Returns:
        Annotation object, valid until Page.Close invoked.

      • AddAnnotGoto

        public final boolean AddAnnotGoto(float[] rect,
                                  int pageno,
                                  float top)
        add goto-page link to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        rect - link area rect [left, top, right, bottom] in PDF coordinate.
        pageno - 0 based pageno to goto.
        top - y coordinate in PDF coordinate, page.height is top of page. and 0 is bottom of page.
        Returns:
        true or false.
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotURI

        public final boolean AddAnnotURI(float[] rect,
                                 java.lang.String uri)
        add URL link to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        rect - link area rect [left, top, right, bottom] in PDF coordinate.
        uri - url address, example: "http://www.radaee.com/en"
        Returns:
        true or false.
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotStamp

        public final boolean AddAnnotStamp(float[] rect,
                                   int icon)
        add an Rubber Stamp to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        rect - icon area rect [left, top, right, bottom] in PDF coordinate.
        icon - predefined value as below:
        0: "Draft"(default icon)
        1: "Approved"
        2: "Experimental"
        3: "NotApproved"
        4: "AsIs"
        5: "Expired"
        6: "NotForPublicRelease"
        7: "Confidential"
        8: "Final"
        9: "Sold"
        10: "Departmental"
        11: "ForComment"
        12: "TopSecret"
        13: "ForPublicRelease"
        14: "Accepted"
        15: "Rejected"
        16: "Witness"
        17: "InitialHere"
        18: "SignHere"
        19: "Void"
        20: "Completed"
        21: "PreliminaryResults"
        22: "InformationOnly"
        23: "End"
        Returns:
        true or false.
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotInk

        public final boolean AddAnnotInk(Matrix mat,
                                 Ink ink,
                                 float orgx,
                                 float orgy)
        add hand-writing to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix for Render function.
        ink - Ink object
        orgx - origin x coordinate in page. in DIB coordinate system
        orgy - origin y coordinate in page. in DIB coordinate system
        Returns:
        true or false
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotHWriting

        public final boolean AddAnnotHWriting(Matrix mat,
                                      HWriting hwriting,
                                      float orgx,
                                      float orgy)
        add hand-writing to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix for Render function.
        hwriting - hand writing object
        orgx - origin x coordinate in page. in DIB coordinate system
        orgy - origin y coordinate in page. in DIB coordinate system
        Returns:
        true or false
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotGlyph

        public final boolean AddAnnotGlyph(Matrix mat,
                                   Path path,
                                   int color,
                                   boolean winding)
        add a user-defined glyph to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix for Render function.
        path - Path object.
        color - text color, formated as 0xAARRGGBB.
        winding - if true, using winding fill rule, otherwise using odd-even fill rule.
        Returns:
        true or false.
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotRect

        public final boolean AddAnnotRect(Matrix mat,
                                  float[] rect,
                                  float width,
                                  int color,
                                  int fill_color)
        add rectangle to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix for Render function.
        rect - 4 elements for left, top, right, bottom in DIB coordinate system
        width - line width
        color - rectangle color, formated as 0xAARRGGBB
        fill_color - fill color in rectangle, formated as 0xAARRGGBB, if alpha channel is 0, means no fill operation, otherwise alpha channel are ignored.
        Returns:
        true or false.
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotLine

        public final boolean AddAnnotLine(Matrix mat,
                                  float[] pt1,
                                  float[] pt2,
                                  int style1,
                                  int style2,
                                  float width,
                                  int color,
                                  int fill_color)
        add line to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix for Render function.
        pt1 - start point, 2 elements for x,y
        pt2 - end point, 2 elements for x,y
        style1 - style for start point:
        0: None
        1: Arrow
        2: Closed Arrow
        3: Square
        4: Circle
        5: Butt
        6: Diamond
        7: Reverted Arrow
        8: Reverted Closed Arrow
        9: Slash
        style2 - style for end point, values are same as style1.
        width - line width in DIB coordinate
        color - line color. same as addAnnotRect.
        fill_color - fill color. same as addAnnotRect.
        Returns:
        true or false.
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotEllipse

        public final boolean AddAnnotEllipse(Matrix mat,
                                     float[] rect,
                                     float width,
                                     int color,
                                     int fill_color)
        add ellipse to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix for Render function.
        rect - 4 elements for left, top, right, bottom in DIB coordinate system
        width - line width
        color - ellipse color, formated as 0xAARRGGBB
        fill_color - fill color in ellipse, formated as 0xAARRGGBB, if alpha channel is 0, means no fill operation, otherwise alpha channel are ignored.
        Returns:
        true or false
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotPopup

        public final boolean AddAnnotPopup(Page.Annotation parent,
                                   float[] rect,
                                   boolean open)

      • AddAnnotMarkup

        public boolean AddAnnotMarkup(Matrix mat,
                              float[] rects,
                              int type)
        add a text-markup annotation to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix for Render function.
        rects - 4 * n rectangles, each 4 elements: left, top, right, bottom in DIB coordinate system. n is decided by length of array.
        type - 0: Highlight, 1: Underline, 2: StrikeOut, 3: Highlight without round corner.
        Returns:
        true or false.
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotInk

        public final boolean AddAnnotInk(Ink ink)
        add hand-writing to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        ink - Ink object in PDF coordinate.
        Returns:
        true or false.
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotLine

        public final boolean AddAnnotLine(float[] pt1,
                                  float[] pt2,
                                  int style1,
                                  int style2,
                                  float width,
                                  int color,
                                  int icolor)
        add line to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        pt1 - start point in PDF coordinate, 2 elements for x,y
        pt2 - end point in PDF coordinate, 2 elements for x,y
        style1 - style for start point:
        0: None
        1: Arrow
        2: Closed Arrow
        3: Square
        4: Circle
        5: Butt
        6: Diamond
        7: Reverted Arrow
        8: Reverted Closed Arrow
        9: Slash
        style2 - style for end point, values are same as style1.
        width - line width in DIB coordinate
        color - line color. same as addAnnotRect.
        icolor - fill color, used to fill arrows of the line.
        Returns:
        true or false.
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotRect

        public final boolean AddAnnotRect(float[] rect,
                                  float width,
                                  int color,
                                  int fill_color)
        add rectangle to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        rect - 4 elements for left, top, right, bottom in PDF coordinate system
        width - line width in PDF coordinate.
        color - rectangle color, formated as 0xAARRGGBB
        fill_color - fill color in rectangle, formated as 0xAARRGGBB, if alpha channel is 0, means no fill operation, otherwise alpha channel are ignored.
        Returns:
        true or false.
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotEllipse

        public final boolean AddAnnotEllipse(float[] rect,
                                     float width,
                                     int color,
                                     int fill_color)
        add ellipse to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        rect - 4 elements for left, top, right, bottom in PDF coordinate system
        width - line width in PDF coordinate
        color - ellipse color, formated as 0xAARRGGBB
        fill_color - fill color in ellipse, formated as 0xAARRGGBB, if alpha channel is 0, means no fill operation, otherwise alpha channel are ignored.
        Returns:
        true or false
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotEditbox

        public final boolean AddAnnotEditbox(float[] rect,
                                     int line_clr,
                                     float line_w,
                                     int fill_clr,
                                     float tsize,
                                     int text_clr)
        add an edit-box on page.
        the font of edit box is set by Global.setTextFont in Global.Init().
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require premium license.
        Parameters:
        rect - 4 elements: left, top, right, bottom in PDF coordinate system.
        line_clr - color of border line, formated as 0xAARRGGBB.
        line_w - width of border line.
        fill_clr - color of background, formated as 0xAARRGGBB. AA must same to line_clr AA, or 0 means no fill color.
        tsize - text size in PDF coordinate system.
        text_clr - text color, formated as 0xAARRGGBB. AA must same to line_clr AA
        Returns:
        true or false.
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotPolygon

        public final boolean AddAnnotPolygon(Path path,
                                     int color,
                                     int fill_color,
                                     float width)
        add polygon to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        path - must be a closed contour.
        color - stroke color formated as 0xAARRGGBB.
        fill_color - fill color, formated as 0xAARRGGBB. if AA == 0, no fill operations, otherwise alpha value is same to stroke color.
        width - stroke width in PDF coordinate
        Returns:
        true or false.
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotPolyline

        public final boolean AddAnnotPolyline(Path path,
                                      int style1,
                                      int style2,
                                      int color,
                                      int fill_color,
                                      float width)
        add polyline to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        path - must be a set of unclosed lines. do not container any move-to operation except the first point in the path.
        style1 - style for start point:
        0: None
        1: Arrow
        2: Closed Arrow
        3: Square
        4: Circle
        5: Butt
        6: Diamond
        7: Reverted Arrow
        8: Reverted Closed Arrow
        9: Slash
        style2 - style for end point, values are same as style1.
        color - stroke color formated as 0xAARRGGBB.
        fill_color - fill color, formated as 0xAARRGGBB. if AA == 0, no fill operations, otherwise alpha value is same to stroke color.
        width - stroke width in PDF coordinate
        Returns:
        true or false.
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotMarkup

        public boolean AddAnnotMarkup(int cindex1,
                              int cindex2,
                              int type)
        add a text-markup annotation to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be only invoked after ObjsStart.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        cindex1 - first char index
        cindex2 - second char index
        type - type as following:
        0: Highlight
        1: Underline
        2: StrikeOut
        3: Highlight without round corner
        4: Squiggly underline.
        Returns:
        true or false.
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

                                    float[] rect)

        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license, and Document.SetCache() invoked.

        rect - 4 elements: left, top, right, bottom in PDF coordinate system.
        Returns:
        true or false.
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotAttachment

        public final boolean AddAnnotAttachment(java.lang.String path,
                                        int icon,
                                        float[] rect)
        add a file as an attachment to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license, and Document.SetCache invoked.
        Parameters:
        path - absolute path name to the file.
        icon - icon display to the page. values as:
        0: PushPin
        1: Graph
        2: Paperclip
        3: Tag
        rect - 4 elements: left, top, right, bottom in PDF coordinate system.
        Returns:
        true or false.
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • AddAnnotRichMedia

        public final boolean AddAnnotRichMedia(java.lang.String path_player,
                                       java.lang.String path_content,
                                       int type,
                                       Document.DocImage image,
                                       float[] rect)
        add a RichMedia annotation to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method require professional or premium license, and Document.SetCache invoked.
        Parameters:
        path_player - path-name to flash player. example: "/sdcard/VideoPlayer.swf", "/sdcard/AudioPlayer.swf"
        path_content - path-name to RichMedia content. example: "/sdcard/video.mp4", "/sdcard/audio.mp3"
        type - 0: Video, 1: Audio, 2: Flash, 3: 3D
        Video like *.mpg, *.mp4 ...
        Audio like *.mp3 ...
        image - DocImage object return from Document.NewImage*();
        rect - 4 elements: left, top, right, bottom in PDF coordinate system.
        Returns:
        true or false.

        public final boolean AddAnnotEditbox(Matrix mat,

        the font of edit box is set by Global.setTextFont in Global.Init().

        this method require premium license.
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix object that passed to Render or RenderToBmp function.
        rect - 4 elements: left, top, right, bottom in PDF coordinate system.
        line_clr - color of border line, formated as 0xAARRGGBB.
        line_w - width of border line.
        fill_clr - color of background, formated as 0xAARRGGBB. AA must same to line_clr AA, or 0 means no fill color.
        tsize - text size in DIB coordinate system.
        text_clr - text color, formated as 0xAARRGGBB. AA must same to line_clr AA
        Returns:
        true or false.
        the added annotation can be obtained by Page.GetAnnot(Page.GetAnnotCount() - 1), if this method return true.

      • ReflowStart

        public final float ReflowStart(float width,
                               float scale,
                               boolean enable_images)
        Start Reflow.
        this method require professional or premium license
        Parameters:
        width - input width, function calculate height.
        scale - scale base to 72 DPI, 2.0 means 144 DPI. the reflowed text will displayed in scale
        enable_images - enable reflow images.
        Returns:
        the height that reflow needed.

      • AddContent

        public boolean AddContent(PageContent content,
                          boolean flush)
        add content stream to this page.
        a premium license is required for this method.
        Parameters:
        content - PageContent object called PageContent.create().
        flush - does need flush all resources?
        true, if you want render page after this method, or false.
        if false, added texts won't displayed till Document.Save() or Document.SaveAs() invoked.
        Returns:
        true or false.
